content:
#  Branch Libraries -- AGH University Main Library 

URL: https://bg.agh.edu.pl/en/library-usage/branch-libraries
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:26

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Branch Libraries 

The University's library and information system is made up of the AGH University Main Library and branch libraries. Very similar rules and regulations apply in each library, but with some slight differences specified for each branch library. The book collections are created according to the scientific profile and teaching activities carried out in the faculties. The rules for collections' circulation are defined separately in each faculty library and are approved by the head of the organisational unit. Information about the collections of faculty libraries can be found in the 
AGH Libraries Catalogue
.

 The collections of branch libraries consist of (situation as at 31 Dec. 2024):

books 211 151 vol.,

journals 18 156 vol.,

special collections 48 431 items. 

In total 277 738 units of account.
 Total current periodical titles sum: 69 titles.
